greetings: Hello and welcome to my portfolio!
title: My name is Nahuel Uliassi Pirchio and
highlightedText: I am a full stack developer.
introduction1: I'm Nahuel, a 22-year-old computer enthusiast and web developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Passionate about technology, calisthenics, and mycology.
introduction2: My background as a Computer Technician, student of Systems Engineering, and self-learner drives me to seek my first job as a full-stack developer, where I can put my creativity and technical skills into action.
introduction3: Ready for challenges and new opportunities. Always eager to learn, improve, and progress!
